alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greene; Western Columbia; Western Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 3:24PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Greene County through 400 PM EDT... At 323 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near North-South Lake Campground, or 7 miles west of Catskill, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hudson, Catskill, Athens, Lorenz Park, Cairo, Hamburg Light, Jefferson Heights, Greenport Center, Round Top, Result, Earlton, Limestreet, Kiskatom, Climax, Cairo Junction, Three Town Bridge, Medway, Athens Station, Leeds and Paradise Hill. This includes Interstate 87 near exit 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Greene; Western Columbia; Western Greene
